page.title: 14The Acorn Public Hs. (cont).
page.content: At present sales of lager and beer average around 500 pints a day.The pints are pumped from the 22 gallon barrels via connecting plastic pipes.Crisps,nuts and biscuits are available to the customers. Social events are held at regular intervals.There are 3 discos every week.The pub has football,pool and darts teams.The women darts team have been particularly keen and successful,winning the local league 3 times in succession. The car park can accommodate 100 vehicles.Also in the car park are wooden doors giving access to the cellar for delivery purposes.There is an off licence attatched to the building.Another feature of the pub is a large well kept beer garden which is regularly used by families in the summer season.
